description: Below is a series of possibilities for how to write the word, “hello.” A pretty standard way to write it is as нёllо, which looks very neat and tidy. Alternatively, you could go for something bigger, or even go french to say, “bonjour!” Include more than one emoticon so that it looks like they greeting one another. ヾ(･ω･｀*)【｡ﾟ+.нёllо｡ﾟ+.】(*´･ω･)ﾉﾞ ﾟ+｡нёllо☆(*-`ω´- )人(ц｀ω´ц*)нёllо☆｡+ﾟ (○≧з)○oо｡…【нёllо】…｡oо○(ω≦★) 【o´∀｀】ﾉ┣┫Ё┗└О☆ (◎´▽｀)ゞнёllо(´▽｀◎)нёllо ♡հҽӀӀօ♡* ૂི•̮͡• ૂ ྀෆ⃛﹡೫٭ॢ*⋆♡⁎೨ ♡⃛ෆ͙⃛ ॢ٭ॢ*⋆♡⁎೨ (☆´益`)c<【。+ﾟъойjоця。+ﾟ】
title: Hello
